text: is a Japanese streaming drama television series directed by Hirokazu Kore-eda. It is an adaptation of the 1979 series Ashura no Gotoku and stars Rie Miyazawa, Machiko Ono, Yū Aoi and Suzu Hirose. The series premiered on Netflix on January 9, 2025. == Cast == * Rie Miyazawa as Tsunako Mitamura * Machiko Ono as Makiko Satomi * Yū Aoi as Takiko Takezawa * Suzu Hirose as Sakiko Takezawa * Masahiro Motoki as Takao Satomi * Ryuhei Matsuda as Shizuo Katsumata * Kisetsu Fujiwara as Hidemitsu Jinnai * Seiyō Uchino as Sadaharu Masukawa * Jun Kunimura as Kotaro * Keiko Matsuzaka as Fuji * Yui Natsukawa as Sadaharu's wife * Naho Toda as Tsunetaro's mistress * Kumi Takiuchi as Keiko Akagi * Kairi Jo as Hiroo Satomi * Maru Nouchi as Yoko * Atsuko Takahata as Jinnai's mother == Production == In November 2024, The series was announced on Netflix. Principal photography was concluded in 2024. The trailer of the series was released on December 16, 2024. == Reception == On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 100% of 10 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 8.3/10. Joly Herman of Common Sense Media gave the series a grade of five out of five stars. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Japanese television series Category:2020s television series debuts Category:2020s drama television series
title: Asura (TV series)
